title: Text blocks for multiline strings
summary: Write multiline strings naturally with triple-quote text blocks.
explanation: Text blocks let you write multiline strings exactly as they appear. No more escaping quotes or adding \n. The compiler strips incidental indentation automatically.

whyModernWins.title: Readable as-is
whyModernWins.desc: JSON, SQL, and HTML look like real JSON, SQL, and HTML in your source.

whyModernWins.title: No escape hell
whyModernWins.desc: Embedded quotes don't need backslash escaping.

whyModernWins.title: Smart indentation
whyModernWins.desc: Leading whitespace is trimmed automatically based on the closing delimiter position.
